  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_sl/130382</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:colos_sl/130382</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Tirni top</string>
            <string language="en">Rail gun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schiene Gewehr</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pistolet de rail</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Injetor do trilho</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pistola della guida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πυροβόλο όπλο ραγών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Arma del carril</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Prikaz delovanja tirnega topa na osnovi toka nabitih delcev v magnetnem polju.</string>
            <string language="en">Principle of rail gun - charged particles in magnetic field are causing force that fires the projectile.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">tirni top</string>
            <string language="en">rail gun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">magnetna sila</string>
            <string language="en">magnetic force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">jacob</string>
            <string language="en">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundregel der Schiene Gewehr - belastete Partikel
in magnetischem fangen verursachen Kraft auf, die das 
Geschoß abfeuert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Principe de pistolet de rail - les particules 
chargées dans le champ magnétique causent la force qui met le feu à
la projectile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Princípio do injetor do trilho - as partículas 
carregadas no campo magnético estão causando a força que ateia fogo
ao projectile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Principio della pistola della guida - le 
particelle caricate nel campo magnetico stanno causando la forza che 
inforna il proiettile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρχή του πυροβόλου όπλου ραγών - τα χρεωμένα μόρια 
στο μαγνητικό πεδίο προκαλούν τη δύναμη που βάζει φωτιά στο 
βλήμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Principio del arma del carril - las partículas 
cargadas en campo magnético están causando la fuerza que enciende el
proyectil.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schiene Gewehr</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetische Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pistolet de rail</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">injetor do trilho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força magnética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jacob</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza magnetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πυροβόλο όπλο ραγών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητική δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colos</string>
